NightSpecial.NightSpecial_Area500_Briefing_Night_SP_0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="97909a67c8d74d4aba4623a71204204a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] how was your first venture out onto
this planet at night?
[Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][UE:Meta key="3965112b50744b47af362a14529c79a5" Scale="1"/]Fun!
[Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][UE:Meta key="4864598bf4ec4ecd94c59892d48a2d03" Scale="1"/]Terrifying!
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="830ac26126dc4c6ebdca8f3780af5651" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Eheheh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] good,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] good!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="e00c29b367404ea3a0e7764270366216" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it has to be done if we're going to
save our pilot.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So hang in there.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ce860f2e4aa14a9a910dca2286e6e521" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What a surprise though![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You met a whole
new kind of Pikmin!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="af0c695ee6ab4f9cb7d37a20f075690a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Before you rescued me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd never seen a
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Glow Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"] myself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="af0c695ee6ab4f9cb7d37a20f075690a" Scale="1"/]I can only assume the Pikmin took a liking
to you, new blood.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="af0c695ee6ab4f9cb7d37a20f075690a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You two should get as much help from
them as you can.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You are helping them
protect their Lumiknolls, after all.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="af0c695ee6ab4f9cb7d37a20f075690a" Scale="1"/]Thooough, I'm not so sure you've got this
"night expedition" thing fully under control
just yet...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="af0c695ee6ab4f9cb7d37a20f075690a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Perhaps I'll go ahead and select the
Lumiknolls for you to retrieve glow sap
from until you are,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="053616fcc3024f668b02d41a3bb38d6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Ahem![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd like to remind you that you are
NOT allowed to overwork my crew.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="d69886d4a48c49f3bec139e876a5dcc9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Good work!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="8eb5c89bc5cc47c9a4f4907c6aa4a4df" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Eheheh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] looks like you're getting the hang
of these night expeditions.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8eb5c89bc5cc47c9a4f4907c6aa4a4df" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I think you're ready.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Next time you venture
out,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can go wherever you would like
to collect glow sap.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b8be00d7af9d4dfd9060c1ed5d0bf70b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitAngry"/]The search for our pilot starts in earnest
now too![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b8be00d7af9d4dfd9060c1ed5d0bf70b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Rescue as many leaflings as you can.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Let's cure them all!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="e95c348ff6de46ae87c5762c150b3c79" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] about that...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's stop and think for a
hot minute here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e95c348ff6de46ae87c5762c150b3c79" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]It's possible [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] hasn't turned into a
leafling yet.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1bab1e3c86a1455aa094e2b144e2c81a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What do you mean?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="a0177d437d4242668f10fe12bcaa0447" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I've spent a lot of time thinking about it...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a0177d437d4242668f10fe12bcaa0447" Scale="1"/]Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] leafling with the dog[System:Color name="Default"] was chasing
me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's when I realized [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
had disappeared.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But that's all.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a0177d437d4242668f10fe12bcaa0447" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]What I'm saying is I never actually saw
him turn into a leafling, or anything.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="c93f6f229adc4f01b632e62d18770b29" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] interesting.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then, uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what should we...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="d144f5d6a44f4504a233154d6e512b05" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Look,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] at the very least,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if we catch that
leafling,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then we might be able to get a
lead on [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s whereabouts.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e9970efda086442da9a1e469d89a0711" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]I see...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] OK.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] search for that leafling[System:Color name="Default"] is
your top priority, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
[Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][UE:Meta key="cebfc4efda4c4ec28ba76931c42dcaa2" Scale="1"/]Copy that!
[Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][UE:Meta key="583c825fd58c492581442b1fb1f0ce5a" Scale="1"/]Understood!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="bdc790a479254644a9d9101093392a58" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Alright,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that concludes this emergency
meeting.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's get to it.
NightSpecial.NightSpecial_Area500_Briefing_Night_SP_1:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="8e34843d81fe429c875f684771ed833a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Eheheh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] looks like you're getting the hang
of these night expeditions.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8e34843d81fe429c875f684771ed833a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I think you're ready.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Next time you venture
out,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can go wherever you would like
to collect glow sap.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="8525fc356dde4da5ac00923906d6ba58" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitAngry"/]The search for our pilot starts in earnest
now too![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8525fc356dde4da5ac00923906d6ba58" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Rescue as many leaflings as you can.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Let's cure them all!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c0ac11f5e78743f29735bb27886eddd6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Alright,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that concludes this emergency
meeting.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's get to it.
NightSpecial.NightSpecial_Area500_Briefing_Night_SP_0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b62f9f5bb0df428a815bfff1fe8bed4d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]If the next leafling we cure isn't [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...
[etc:Wait frame="8"/]what are we going to do?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="0de5d255334c4c31ba292538ad647371" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]I told youâ€”just [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]focus on finding the
leafling with the dog[System:Color name="Default"].

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="da7b00ace4ff4868b84f6b06a778d318" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]But we're the Rescue Corps.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We can't
leave anyone behind.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="3b596305382041baacc5f8f5f7f310f8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Wellll now,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we can keep harvesting
glow sap,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] can't we?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3b596305382041baacc5f8f5f7f310f8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]And look on the bright side...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]the leafling
I heal tomorrow might be [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0e86e02225cd44a2bfa4bfc7086e99c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]That's true!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="de7d5181b75f4de2bd286b0c47ea6f2a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I'll have the medicine ready by morning.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Until then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] enjoy the suspense,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="bb6fcfebd2d04971b3ff802351b1cc6a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this leafling...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It kinda looks like
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="2e165e1f1d774e9788bcf32150eb6909" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Uh...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]you think so?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="ed432fe5b32f43909913a85b1a719689" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]It's so...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]leafy.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can't really tell one
way or another.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="9049024c554840669848cecac2ab690c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Yeah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but the shape of its...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]leafiness...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]or
maybe the overall vibe...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I don't know.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The
way it grows...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]it looks like him, is all.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="cdd5c60486ca467f9a5efcb68e30e250" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]What is a [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]-like way of growing?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="60419943735f475dab20278fbeadc61a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]I don't know![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Look,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's just what my gut
is telling me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Yon[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Cure this one
for me tomorrow!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="f7b45409046d41c4b50a439fbc6902f5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger03"/]Copy that,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] roger,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] ten-four,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and so on.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'll begin preparing the medicine
right away.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="54a55a353e8c49ac84d48e6a22df7cd0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Welcome back from your night expedition!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="eb3ca3872b924f28af1cf2c366d3677c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Thanks to you two,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was able to prepare
the medicine,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ad7f50c08ed944ce8907e674477403b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You did it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] That means we can cure
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c8bf2f915faf4b96804ccc7a07ecd7a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]It's been quite a journey...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]but we've
accomplished our mission at last!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="d21d046019504f02bc3dcfcf253c3be9" Scale="1"/]Well then, everyone,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] get ready for an
exciting morning.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="bedbca4cb4b2446abc830e6ac215d755" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] nice job with the night expeditions.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b18b79908fa44d72a9c4cfe1b5443e26" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Oof,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it was rough out there this time.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b18b79908fa44d72a9c4cfe1b5443e26" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]I don't get it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Why do Lumiknolls always...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]glow like that?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b18b79908fa44d72a9c4cfe1b5443e26" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If they didn't light up,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] they wouldn't
attract so many creatures.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="1f02da365246473587ceb05c9c794835" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Mmm-hmm,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] perhaps the Lumiknolls
want to draw the creatures toward them.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="d30d7f0388164016861f2a7a9a341ef8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] But if they get hurt, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]they can't
make glow sap...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]or am I missing
something here?!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="1198e61e597f43f2b57a0f297e9fb6bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]On this world and others,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there are 
creatures who simply don't growâ€”don't
thriveâ€”if they don't experience danger.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1198e61e597f43f2b57a0f297e9fb6bd" Scale="1"/]No matter how strange that sounds,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's
quite possible Lumiknolls are like that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
They need to experience danger to thrive.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="bb967770eb8b49a887dd4da620a34c5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Um...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I guess that...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]makes sense.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="7ab2bf021b77476a80adbc4d6e0b7050" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] nice job with the night expeditions.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="e053e595cf9647aa977be96757264432" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]No... [etc:Wait frame="8"/]Dingo...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Don't...eat that...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]no...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e053e595cf9647aa977be96757264432" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly2"/]Agh![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e053e595cf9647aa977be96757264432" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger"/]Oh, um, excuse me![etc:Wait frame="15"/] But yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] excellent
work there on the night expedition,
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="52ac7a33b6c6411d94e4fc5c46d0f636" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Eheh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you feeling a bit groggy right now?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3548ab824ed24b929b94bb6bfa1215ec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] no![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I just dozed off for a second,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
that's all![etc:Wait frame="15"/] As always,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm awake and totally
alert for these night expeditions.[etc:Wait frame="15"/][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3548ab824ed24b929b94bb6bfa1215ec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]You're hearing my transmissions loud and
clear,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]?!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="ef3c5b541d1c4aff8721413669f3567a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm the night-expedition guide,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so it's
OK for you to get some sleep, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3acc77963453467e88a7b4e05ba08dc9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]No, it isn't![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm the Rescue Corps comms
operator.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can't sleep on the job![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3acc77963453467e88a7b4e05ba08dc9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Besides,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I always make sure to take a
quick nap before anyone sets out,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
so I'm fine.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="6a4ca9d7e93d4705b13e7862aa6e28fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I see...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] why don't you try a
special concoction of mine?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I call it
"Tired-Be-Gone,"[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="4d14e893e5124d08bb262e2c48f97d15" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]You're telling me it's perfectly OK to drink
something THAT color?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Really?
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ad259c0e698545518ac601a0069da76a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Welcome back from your night expedition!
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="f6b136a995b246dca6633c62217ccea8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]KEE-HEE![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's complete at last!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0dc0dcf8822d48e496b2a8fee9c94559" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what exactly have you been doing
locked up in the Lab all night?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="5665d166d6f14879ba5fc99eafb5b268" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Behold![etc:Wait frame="8"/] My latest invention![etc:Wait frame="15"/] This device
can perfectly reproduce anyone's voice!
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="47a61149b40047e1bc171a19dc2a5282" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]And this is useful for rescue work...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]how?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01_NoName"/][UE:Meta key="d7c61cc327ef482d94121e15b4eed116" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]KEE-HEE![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Only a fool incapable of grasping
the seismic implications of great scientific
discoveries would ask such a question!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="b1c48bf9efe242f7bc6392ab5965309d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Wow, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Really?! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]That's a bit much,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
don't you think?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="dde3f124c71a4c13b31d2fa44f62ea85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]But...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I didn't![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wouldn't! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'd never say
something like that![etc:Wait frame="15"/] That was...[etc:Wait frame="8"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="11fa3add4fd24133bb6c4f29cc4a7045" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]What?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] OK, OK.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Let me tell you what I CAN
grasp...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's that this thing is going to be a
problem.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] So I'm banning it.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Kee-hee indeed!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9001ad5b05814ca6ab1e5df898804443" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Why does nighttime on this planet have to
be so...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]creepy?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="1ac40933c3d1468b8e900af4af1226a6" Scale="1"/]What's this?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Comms guy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you afraid of
the dark?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f51356c4f88448e888ad27623c6e7d08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]No.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm totally fine with the dark and with
nighttime on other planets.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's just...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f51356c4f88448e888ad27623c6e7d08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]There's something about this place.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It feels
like something might jump out and get you
at any moment.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="2ef7d6aac8db4f83ba70cd036d7880a3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Haha![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Sounds like you're scared of ghosts.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You know there's no such thing,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="82904ca2278945fe98e72bbabb2d43b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Well, actually,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] science has yet to DISprove
the existence of ghosts.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="84e869c7038a493389d58c5d2d071284" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]What?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Yon[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're into all this ghost
hooey?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Really?!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="64ad033212324e1ab7011b1ddaacd67f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]No, I wouldn't say that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But there is
something that's been on my mind...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="64ad033212324e1ab7011b1ddaacd67f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]You ever noticed how the corpses left by
the creatures during the day...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]are nowhere
to be found during night expeditions?
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="69012d45d0874dce9105f55d6c07dafb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Hold up...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]uh...
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3598d3f69c22451ca2553d63386e1224" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Can we please stop talking about this?!

[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="3ffc6f1749414e01850878e75113ff66" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Well, look who's up and about.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] How are
things going?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="4cc0c87ce5664860b0e78a13dd42ab8b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Why are you awake at this hour?

[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="2c6e3e4c631449f8b909fa17e5114b8b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I don't know.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I just woke up, I guess.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2c6e3e4c631449f8b909fa17e5114b8b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I'm interested in night expeditions.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Is it
OK if I observe?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="494f333e431e4f54945fddc910c015eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Oh, I'm sorry![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Tonight's expedition just
wrapped up...

[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="4328a64c155d4cfe900e75d8c278461c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Bad timing on my part, then.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll just try
again next time.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="d6ed7874e3064e2984e05a4919c0f5c8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] pleaseâ€”you're welcome to observe
anytime you like.
NightSpecial.NightSpecial_Area500_Briefing_Night_SP_1:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="38bf0a69674b4d52a93129225454aeaf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Hey, new blood.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Have you been using
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Glow Seeds[System:Color name="Default"]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="38bf0a69674b4d52a93129225454aeaf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Well, please do.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I want to know more about
Glow Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so try experimenting with the
seeds a bunch for me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="38bf0a69674b4d52a93129225454aeaf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]There are limits to what I can do being
stuck here inside the S.S. Shepherd so
much,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0df2c19beaf346739ba4ec2fa0634afb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You're not conducting experiments
on the Glow Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] are you?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="0798207ead1c4c9a85e3fe0f085e82bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]No, no,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] of course not.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You have nothing
to worry about.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0798207ead1c4c9a85e3fe0f085e82bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Besides,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the Glow Pikmin are fiiine.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Fire,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
ice,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] electricityâ€”none of it bothers them...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
not even poisonous gas.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0798207ead1c4c9a85e3fe0f085e82bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]So really,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can't do anything unkind to
them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="14c7d12d8f1e4516b9f0c62db8296182" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]And tell me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] how did you figure that out?!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="4e4f0a8015704bc1bd9b2468cd0be20b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]My observations have led me to an
important realization...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Glow Pikmin
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]cannot die[System:Color name="Default"].
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="33f7ec3b616f42068228e3e273e2dc11" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] How?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] What do you mean?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="8e6e0866303a48caaf593f062a29eb0c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when a Glow Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] meets its
demise...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]it turns into photons and returns
to the Lumiknoll.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Or so it seems.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="61247a3417cd4948a9a0d5d25234506f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Are they...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]really Pikmin, then?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="355ee5371fdb432c9be04249199062d9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]What an incredible discovery![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="355ee5371fdb432c9be04249199062d9" Scale="1"/]Glow Pikmin...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]even when touched by fire
or electricity...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]are fine![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Completely
unharmed!
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c6fba24b38c945b5883d648e22d9be94" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that sounds downright useful!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="f1424860c47a4dfeac270b3691a41ae0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's not all,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Neither water
nor poison bother them the least
bit either!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c5264f8181d04ae2af707d791de6d247" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That's it.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] We must train ourselves to be
as strong as Glow Pikmin.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If they can do
it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we can too,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="c5fc30e9cc3b432c98f4eb9aacb6d5aa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I'm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]pretty sure there's no amount of
training that will make us impervious
to fire.
